title: Stock Futures Edge Up Ahead of Inflation Data
sub_head: Economists forecast U.S. inflation hit an almost four-decade high in November
body:
U.S. stock futures and bond yields rose ahead of fresh inflation data that could influence the Federal Reserveâ€™s timeline for reducing stimulus measures.
Futures for the S&P 500 gained 0.3% Friday. The index retreated Thursday but was on track for its strongest week of gains since February. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 rose 0.3% Friday, and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were up 0.1%.
